channel.title: angli on Whitaker Lab
channel.description: Recent content in angli on Whitaker Lab

item.title: Who's Ang Li
item.description: Basic information I’m now a PhD student at the Institute of Automation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (CASIA) and just joined Kirstie’s lab as a one-year visiting student at the Alan Turing Institute, funded by Chinese Scholarship Council (CSC). My current research interests include neuroscience, genetics, neuroimaging and artistic data visualization, and understanding or building biomarkers for mental disorders. I like challenges but sometimes I also need a man to kick my ass behind.
